about:
Hi, my name is John Doe. I"m just about the most boring type of person you could
possibly imagine. I like collecting leaves from the tree in my back yard and documenting
each time I eat a peanut that is non-uniform. I am not a robot. Please hire me.

experience.description:
Working in several challenging projects, predominantly in React and Node.js.
Recently working as lead front-end developer of the Eugenio IoT plataform,
facing inquiring demands, such as micro front-ends, componentization and
performance optimization.

As a part time developer, working remotely half of the time, I helped to develop
a smart booking system for medical appointments using the MEAN stack.

I worked predominantly in a product that analyzes and provides visualization
for big data. The challenges I have faced included the overall evolution of the
product, adding and improving functionalities while keeping a good user experience.

Institutional website for the 24º Dental Congress of Bauru plus a registering
application. The attendees could pay online while organizers could track the payments.

publications.publisher: SIGDOC - Special Interest Group on Design of Communication
publications.title: An approach to improve the accessibility and usability of existing web systems (co-author)

volunteering.description:
Introduce computer science to school students, helping them to complete short
programming tutorials.

education.degree: University of Ontario Institute of Technology

recommendations.message:
He often manages to finish his tasks with good quality and efficiently, but he is
rarely stressed (...) I would definitely appreciate to continue working with him
